name: Wine Tasting
description: Stroll through the city with our sommelier, a glass of wine in hand, have a bite to eat at various culinary hot spots and experience real street pairing! These are our gourmet tours throughout Munich! In doing so, we show what Munich freedom means: Pleasurable enjoyment on the go, simple yet brilliant tastes from all over the world!
